definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: that which surrounds, or is round;—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: pl. surrounding places, [[מְסִבֵּי]] ´[[יְרוּשׁ]] 2Ki 23:5 places round about Jerus.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: as adv. [[מֵסַב]] round about 1Ki 6:29; fpl. [[מְסִבּוֹת]] on all sides, in all directions, Job 37:12 (of cloud Di < of lightning Bu Du).
sf. [[מְסִבּוֹ]] Ct So 1:12 dub.: round table  Ew De; cushion, divan Bae Kau; cf. on all these Bu.—[[מְסִבָָּי]] Ps 140:10 v. [[סבב]]
